mdRecord.dcterms:title: Dickerson Family
mdRecord.dcterms:description: A group of Dickerson family photographs. From top left clockwise - Amos Dickerson; Hattie or Mattie? Dickerson; Group of young people (note, black arm band); baby?; Group of young women; Bailing hay; Mattie Dickerson; Mattie Dickerson
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
